product_name: The North Face Snorkle Hoodie Jacket - Women's
long_description: When the pow is deep and the face shots are plenty, the women's Snorkle hoodie by The North Face is great for layering under a shell or even wearing on its own on warm, late-season days on the hill. Warm, breathable and smooth-faced polyester fleece contains 42% recycled material and a touch of spandex, offering a soft, stretchy feel for comfort and free range of motion. FlashDry(TM) microporous particles are incorporated directly into the fabric to dramatically improve moisture-wicking performance and increase dry time. Full-length Vislon front zipper delivers smooth, easy use and won't catch or snag. Tall collar and fixed hood with stretch binding help keep you cozy in cooler temps. Hidden zip hand pockets; one hidden zip chest pocket. Thumbholes let you secure the sleeves over hands and wrists for warmth. The North Face Snorkle hoodie has a streamlined, active fit for easy layering and form-following comfort.
short_description: When the pow is deep and the face shots are plenty, the women's Snorkle hoodie by The North Face is great for layering under a shell or even wearing on its own on warm, late-season days on the hill.
